evidence.claim: eMedic Technologies utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The company implements HIPAA-compliant practices for data handling.
Integration with FHIR for health data exchange is outlined in their API documentation.
X12 transaction sets like 837 and 835 are supported for EDI operations.
Utilizes RESTful APIs for integration with Electronic Health Records (EHRs).

icp.icp_reason: Focus on interoperability and healthcare data exchange aligns with API-first and X12 use cases.
matched_use_cases: Integration with healthcare payers and providers
